dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Use of Hilton Hotels Trademark]
dmca.body:
t

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Tuesday, May 02, 2006 9:18 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Use of Hilton Hotels Trademark]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Use of Hilton Hotels Trademark]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Use of Hilton Hotels Trademark
Date:         Tue, 2 May 2006 09:48:03 -0400 (EDT)
From:         legal2@hilton.com
To:         mock2an3@comcast.net
CC:         abuse@theplanet.com



05/02/2006

To whom it may concern:

Hilton is the owner of the Hilton mark, and Hilton recently became aware
of your use of this trademarked word in multiple page elements at
http://www.timesharehilton.com/ to attract internet traffic to your
website.  Your use of this trademark to attract internet traffic is an
obvious attempt to capitalize upon the goodwill associated with the
Hilton name.



Accordingly, Hilton demands that you immediately cease and desist from
any further use of the Hilton mark on your website.  Additionally,
Hilton must receive a reply to this email within ten (10) days from the
date of this letter as written confirmation that you will make no use of
the Hilton marks in the future.  Hilton will be monitoring your website
and awaits your written confirmation via email.



Nothing in this letter shall be deemed a waiver of any rights or
remedies of Hilton, all of which are expressly reserved.



Legal Department
Hilton Hotels Corporation



Ref:  5.27.18


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFEV2oxvK/XpJs6oyURAlOiAKCTKOQ/mRmwUjYTgKrX3Ugj/DSgmwCdHlmQ
FP+hJnjjNucueT8UYfja1bU=
=jD34
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
